trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 公開<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>類型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別值由衍生類別的建構函式呼叫時的初始設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for a data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>中資料項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The data item that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 與此相關聯的資料項目<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> created.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>建立。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The item to get an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>的。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得子項目的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項模式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer"> </xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects for child items that are not virtualized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>應該傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>物件未虛擬化的子系項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects for child items that are not virtualized; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects all child items.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>應該傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>物件不虛擬化; 的子系項目<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>應該傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>物件所有子項目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an element by the specified property value.
trans-unit.target: 依指定的屬性值中擷取的項目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The item in the container after which to begin the search.
trans-unit.target: 要開始搜尋在其後容器中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The property that contains the value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 包含要擷取之值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的值。

trans-unit.source: The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no items match.
trans-unit.target: 符合的搜尋條件; 第一個項目否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>如果沒有項目相符。
